snippet: Representative John F. Tierney, a Massachusetts Democrat who won re-election in 2010 despite family members’ roles in a gambling operation, faces a tougher contest this year.
abstract: Democratic Rep John F Tierney of Massachusetts, who won re-election in 2010 despite family members’ roles in a gambling operation, faces a tougher contest in 2012; he is fending off new accusations about his knowledge of his family's enterprise as he faces a credible challenge from Republican Richard R Tisei.
lead_paragraph: Representative John F. Tierney, a Massachusetts Democrat who won re-election in 2010 despite family members’ roles in a gambling operation, faces a tougher contest this year.

headline.seo: Tierney’s Family Ties Re-emerge in House Race
headline.main: Family Ties to Gambling Re-emerge in House Race
headline.print_headline: Family Ties to Gambling Re-emerge in House Race
